title: This Week's Best-Dressed Celebrities Went Back to Black
text:
Like chic vampires.

View photos Alexa Demie, Sara Sampaio and Amy Jackson. Photos: Getty Images More

Where summer was all about neons and spring was packed with pastels (groundbreaking), celebrities are leaning more toward classic all-black ensembles for the red carpet as temperatures drop. And though most of their dresses don't hit below the knee — nothing a pair of tights can't solve! — we'll be taking inspiration from these looks for this upcoming holiday season.

"Euphoria"'s Alexa Demie went for a sultry-but-sweet take in Giambattista Valli for the brand's H&M collaboration show in Rome, with a dress that paralleled the actress' usual attire as Maddy Perez on the hit millennial series. Portuguese model Sara Sampaio looked holiday-ready in a glitzy, sequined blazer dress adorned with feathers by Michael Kors while attending God's Love We Deliver's 13th Annual Golden Heart Awards Celebration. And last, but certainly not least, Amy Jackson — English actress and model — donned a similar blazer dress at the 2019 Ethnicity Awards in London.

See more of our favorite celebrity looks from this past week in the gallery below.

View photos Halima Aden in Giambattista Valli at the Giambattista Valli Loves H&M show in Rome, Italy. Photo: Stefania M. D'Alessandro/Getty Images More

View the 12 images of this gallery on the original article
